page.title: 15HEALTH KING'S NYMPTON
page.content: {HEALTH CENTRES}-This area is in the catchment areas of three Health Centres, two based at{South Molton}and one at{Chulmleigh.}Doctors may be seen by appointment at the centres and will make house calls when necessary. {LOCAL SURGERY }One of the South Molton practices holds a short weekly surgery in a local house. {CHIROPODY }By arrangement a chiropodist has a clinic either in the Church Hall or in a local house for elderly people who are unable to visit clinics at Health Centres {DENTAL CARE }The nearest dentist's surgery is at South Molton. {HOSPITAL }The nearest hospital is {The North Devon District Hospital }in Barnstaple.
